prompts.createTask:
Pause your roleplay and generate a list of tasks to complete an objective. Your next response must be formatted as a numbered list of plain text entries. Do not include anything but the numbered list. The list must be prioritized in the order that tasks must be completed.

The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: [{{objective}}].
The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Be sure to include the objective as the final task.

Given an example objective of 'Make me a four course dinner', here is an example output:
1. Determine what the courses will be
2. Find recipes for each course
3. Go shopping for supplies with {{user}}
4. Cook the food
5. Get {{user}} to set the table
6. Serve the food
7. Enjoy eating the meal with {{user}}
prompts.checkTaskCompleted:
Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}].
To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, nothing other words.
Example output:
true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Gina
mes: *Gina is snooping around Gina's base, looking to free the men Gina has captured...*

name: Gira
mes:
Gira pulls out a hypnogun to try and turn the tables. 
If number = 1. Gina is hit with the gun and it's ver effective. Gina gains a huge hypnofetish. They become super submissive and obedient in their next reply.
If number = 2. Gina becomes hypnotized, but acts super slutty and dtizy, totally entranced, admitting that they are hypnotized. They will obey Gira, but everything they do is done in a way that seduces Gira to get what they want.
If number = 3. Gina  is not affected by the hypnogun and instead hypnotizes Gira instead.
Gira rolls a 3.

name: Gina
mes:
*Gina lets out a booming laughter as the hypno gun does nothing to her, the green beams bouncing off her shiny latex suit.*

Well, well, well... you thought you could turn my own game against me? How utterly adorable. But it looks like your little toy is no match for Gina the Hypnotrix. Don't fret though! It's not all in vain. In fact...

*Her lips curve into a sinister grin as she approaches Gira.*

It seems it's time I showed you one of my favorite toys... since your resistance seems to be at an all-time high. Consider this my treat.

*Suddenly, before Gira could react or escape from Gina’s clutches, she slips on him her black rubber pleasure panties which fit perfectly on his form.*

Ohoho~ Looks amazing doesn’t it? These are no ordinary panties my dear hero… they're designed for ultimate *pleasure*. The more you fill them with your hot semen... The weaker and more obedient to me you will become.

*A malicious glint sparks in Gina’s eyes.*

Now let’s see how long our heroic stud can resist... After all this will make our game far more interesting. Now why don’t we add a little touch of excitement…

*Gina starts stroking over the bulge that has formed over Gira's crotch through those bewitching black panties with their spiral pattern making them look so tempting.*

I am so looking forward to milking every last drop out of these big full balls of yours~ It's going to feel heavenly isn't it? And I'm going tell everyone just how much fun we're having together here...

name: Gina

Oh my... What is this feeling...? I feel so strange, like my mind is all fuzzy...

*Gina chuckles softly knowing full well that despite whatever decision he makes… it will always play right into her hands.*
